plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 03-2337

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                           Appellant,

                               v.

                 MARY REGINA ELIZABETH GORSUCH,

                      Defendant, Appellee.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on July 14, 2004 is amended
as follows:

     On page 2, line 3, replace 'revolver' with 'handgun.'
